feature.label: The Mascot 2010 ACP Editor
feature.description: The ACP Editor Plugin is a stuctured editor for the creation and mainteneance of MASCOT 2010 SETs documents (*.macp files). SETs are XML documents that capture the structure of MASCOT 2010 systems as expressed in ACP diagrams; MASCOT Mahcines read them as configuration files. For more information regarding MASCOT 2010 and MOJO (a refernece implementaion of a MASCOT 2010 Machine in Java) please refer to the URL below.
